startingGameText: </br></br>You can not only hear</br>but feel the powerful</br>rumbling of the concrete walls</br>of your bunker</br>
</br></br>You sit in the cold</br>and darkness of your new</br>concrete home, waiting</br>for the bombing to end so</br>you can start up your generator
</br></br>You fear this may become</br>your tomb if the walls dont</br>hold
</br></br>The rumbling soon subsides</br>and you are left in silence
